availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel Edwards (Christian County, KY, prov govt conv rep)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married Margaret Cary Edwards in Christian County on June 10, 1841. Father of Mary E. Edwards, James H. Edwards, Samuel R. Edwards, and infant Edwards. Farmer in Christian County in 1850. Member of the provisional government convention in Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 438A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Christian County Marriages, 1818-1887, Film #001942963, p. 445.
_ Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989_, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Madison County Administrator Bonds, 1830-1869; Vol 19-20, 1970-1975 (Accessed through ancestry.com on November 15, 2019), p. 413 of microfilm.
KYR-0004-033-0001.
